summary: Administrative and leadership expert with an MBA and BA in Accounting. Highly skilled in human resources, financial management, and operations, with military and civilian leadership experience. Proven ability to oversee complex projects from conception to completion, lead diverse teams, implement process improvements, and communicate effectively at all levels.

experience.title: Collections Manager
experience.description: Oversaw management of collections; provided leadership, training, and performance analysis to ensure staff proficiency and compliance with applicable laws; developed collection strategies and work plans; negotiated settlements for delinquent accounts; conducted initial applicant interviews for HR.

experience.title: Aviation Electronics Technician
experience.description: Maintained avionics shop operations; trained and supervised personnel; awarded for innovative electronic travel claims processing system; saved government >$500K; captured accounting errors >$150K; served as Equal Opportunity Manager; Department Training Specialist; managed NAVL MIS; prepared mobilization data and schedules; supervised 35 personnel.
